panels.description: Success rate when ftmetric call to freqtrade server

targets.expr: max without(type) (fthelper_internal_ft_call{cluster=~"$cluster", type="success"}) / max without(type) (fthelper_internal_ft_call{cluster=~"$cluster", type="total"})

panels.title: Freqtrade success rate
